why_matters.title: Why it Matters
why_matters.intro: This simple rule, recommended by eye care professionals, helps combat digital eye strain and supports healthier screen habits while boosting productivity.

every_20_min.title: Every 20 Minutes
every_20_min.desc: Regular breaks prevent eye fatigue and maintain focus throughout your workday. Think of it as a mini-reset for your visual system.

look_20_feet.title: Look 20 Feet Away
look_20_feet.desc: Focusing on distant objects relaxes your eye muscles and eases visual stress. It's like stretching for your eyes.

for_20_sec.title: For 20 Seconds
for_20_sec.desc: This short pause gives your eyes a chance to fully relax and readjust, while also promoting mindful blinking and better posture.

key_benefits.title: Key Benefits
items: Reduced digital eye strain and fatigue
Prevention of dry eyes and blurred vision
Healthier screen-time habits for long-term wellness

features.title: Protect Your Digital Vision
features.description: More screen time doesn't have to mean strained eyes. BlinkBlink helps you stay focused, refreshed, and in control of your screen habits.

smart_break.title: Smart Break Experience
smart_break.description: From gentle break reminders to insightful summaries, BlinkBlink guides you through a complete eye care routine.

schedules.title: Customizable Schedules
schedules.description: Tailor breaks to your needs. Set intervals and durations that align with your workflow.

analytics.title: Insightful Analytics
analytics.description: Understand your screen habits with clear visuals. Stay on top of your digital wellness.

theme.title: Seamless Theme Integration
theme.description: Automatically adapts to your system's light or dark mode for a consistent and comfortable visual experience.
